entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is mentioned as wanting to ask Mr. Crouch a question and looking around for waiters.

entities.name: mr crouch
entities.description: Mr. Crouch is a person who has been calling Percy 'Weatherby'. Harry wants to ask him if he has stopped doing this.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who has been called 'Weatherby' by Mr. Crouch.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who uses magic to order food for himself and the others at the table.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is mentioned as not seeming to be concerned about the new method of dining.

entities.name: house-elves
entities.description: House-elves are people who work in the household and are likely to be affected by the new method of dining.

relationships.description: Dumbledore uses magic to order pork chops for himself.
Harry picks up his menu and looks around for waiters.
Dumbledore speaks to his plate to order food.
